name: Super Turrican 2
summary:
Super Turrican 2 is a 16-bit shooter game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, developed by Factor 5 and marketed by Ocean Software in 1995. Part of the Turrican series, it is the sequel of Super Turrican for the same platform.
The game was released on the Virtual Console in North America on September 29, 2008. However, it was retired without any explanation on October 2013 in all regions.
